title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
Colin explains why Jimmy Garoppolo is the perfect QB for the 49ers even though he's not among the most talented QBs in the NFL. He believes the Steelers made the right choice to start rookie QB Kenny Pickett and it's time for them to stop being afraid to fail. He also reveals his Herd Hierarchy after week 4 of the NFL season ranking the top 10. Plus, Super Bowl champion Sean Payton joins the show to talk about the Rams offensive struggles and what makes the Chiefs offense special. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
